meanings.definition: Kuias (noun): a type of bird native to New Zealand.
meanings.sent1: The kuias chirped happily in the forest.
meanings.sent2: I saw a beautiful kuias flying in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to imitate the kuias' call.
meanings.sent4: Her colorful dress resembled the vibrant feathers of a kuias.
meanings.sent5: The kuias' distinctive call echoed through the valley.

meanings.definition: Kuias (verb): to act in a cautious or careful manner.
meanings.sent1: She always kuias when crossing the busy street.
meanings.sent2: Remember to kuias when handling fragile items.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to kuias around the sleeping dog.
meanings.sent4: He decided to kuias through the dark alley.
meanings.sent5: The detective kuias as he approached the suspect.
